name: Jean Grey
description: A member of the X-Men, Jean Grey is a powerful mutant with telepathic and telekinetic abilities. She can read minds, move objects with her thoughts, and has been known to possess immense cosmic powers.

name: Iron Man
description: Iron Man, also known as Tony Stark, is a genius inventor and billionaire who creates a high-tech suit of armor. The suit allows him to fly, shoot energy blasts, and enhance his strength, turning him into a superhero who fights evil.

name: Blob
description: Blob, whose real name is Fred Dukes, is a mutant characterized by his massive size and near-impenetrable skin. He has superhuman strength and can become immovable at will, often making him a formidable opponent.

name: Beast
description: Beast, or Hank McCoy, is a mutant with a blue, furry appearance resembling a beast. Despite his looks, he is extremely intelligent and serves as a scientist. He possesses superhuman strength, agility, and keen senses.

name: Wolverine
description: Wolverine, named Logan, is a mutant known for his rapid healing ability and retractable claws made of an indestructible metal called adamantium. He has enhanced senses and a rugged personality, often working as part of the X-Men.

name: Jessica Jones
description: Jessica Jones is a private investigator with superhuman strength and limited flight capabilities. Formerly a superhero, she now uses her abilities to solve cases, often dealing with dark and complex situations.

name: Polaris
description: Polaris, or Lorna Dane, is a mutant who can control magnetic fields, much like a magnet. She can manipulate metal, create force fields, and fly. She is connected to other characters with similar abilities.

name: Kitty Pryde
description: Also known as Shadowcat, Kitty Pryde is a young mutant who can pass through solid objects by altering her molecular density. Intelligent and tech-savvy, she often uses her phasing ability to outmaneuver opponents.

name: Blade
description: Blade, whose real name is Eric Brooks, is a half-human, half-vampire warrior. He has all the strengths of vampires but none of their weaknesses, like sensitivity to sunlight. Blade dedicates his life to hunting vampires and protecting humans.
